group_1.textRight: Oi, rookie,
you bring back the manga I left at Sis's house?

group_1.textLeft: Of course I did!

group_1.textRight: ...Hey, ain't this the first series of "Greedy Sensei"?!
I told ya to go fetch the second series!

group_1.textLeft: Ah – shoot...!
I was told to bring the first series...
...of "Super Cosmos Palace"...

group_1.textRight: God damn, what're you doing?

group_1.textLeft: S-sorry about that...
...But, I'll get it right next time!
I'll do more important duties to be more useful@to the group!

group_1.textRight: You sayin' bringing Juri the Great's manga ain't@important?

group_1.textLeft: I-it's...[chara:103601:lipSynch_0][wait:1.0][chara:103601:cheek_0][chara:103601:face_mtn_ex_030.exp.json][chara:103601:lipSynch_1]important?

group_1.textRight: ...If this builds up my stress and makes me explode,
then everyone's gonna be well done!

group_1.textLeft: Eeeek~!
Cut it out, Juri!@Picking on the junior, how pathetic.

group_1.textRight: You okay? You don't have to worry about her.

group_1.textLeft: Ah, umm... Suzuka...

group_1.textRight: Sakuya's fine.
You only just joined Promised Blood...
...and you look depressed with nothing but@odd jobs to do.

group_1.textLeft: Ah – I let it show on my face...

group_1.textRight: You're pretty easy to read.
But don't worry, you'll be given important tasks@in no time.

group_1.textLeft: Really, I will?!

group_1.textRight: ...To be honest, not all my tasks have been things@to puff out my chest about either...

group_1.textLeft: No matter!
Whatever they make me do, it was my decision@to join!

group_1.textRight: Then on your way back from getting my manga@go buy some sweets for me too.
Here, some change for it.

group_1.textLeft: Quit makin' her your gofer.
She's right!
Workin' people for personal matters—
You'll ruin the dignity o' the Three Sisters who built@this group!

group_1.textRight: You should go hit up the convenience store@with the newbie.
I'm starving.

group_1.textLeft: *Sigh*...Hikaru's got other places to shop at,@so I'll go while I'm at it,
but only this once, got it?!

group_1.textRight: Urara, lesgo together!

group_1.textLeft: Ah – okay...!
I was the youngest in the group,
so they threw all their chores onto me, makin' it@hard to investigate them.

group_1.textRight: It must be a...strict pecking order or something.
But, Miss Kirari and Miss Suzuka helped you,@didn't they?

group_1.textLeft: Yeah...
I used to think they were scary,
but they're no different than me, just girls.
Sometimes they'd talk on and on.

group_1.textRight: So it was thanks to everyone at Promised Blood...
...that you got to fit in.
They must have been really good to you.

group_1.textLeft: Ah.....[chara:103601:lipSynch_0][wait:1.0][chara:103601:cheek_0][chara:103601:face_mtn_ex_030.exp.json][chara:103601:lipSynch_1]yeah...
(I was a member of the group,@so they were nice to me...)
(And yet I'm a spy...@I've been tricking them this whole time...)
